hero.title: Guiding Your Academic Future
hero.subtitle: Bridging the gap between ambition and admission. We are your trusted partners in navigating the complex world of higher education.

intro.title: Who We Are
intro.description: RightPath Saarthi is a premier career counseling platform dedicated to demystifying the university admissions process. Founded by former admissions officers and education strategists, we understand what top-tier institutions are looking for. We bridge the gap between student ambition and academic reality through personalized guidance, data-driven strategies, and unwavering support.

philosophy.title: Our Philosophy
philosophy.description: Driven by a commitment to student success, we believe that every student has a unique story worth telling. Our job is to help you tell it.

cards.title: Our Mission
cards.description: To provide personalized counseling that demystifies the admissions process and empowers students to make informed decisions about their future.

cards.title: Our Vision
cards.description: A world where every student has access to the best educational opportunities that align with their talents, regardless of their background or geography.

values.title: Core Values
values.subtitle: The principles that guide every interaction

items.title: Integrity
items.description: We provide honest, unbiased advice. We prioritize your long-term success over short-term gains.

items.title: Innovation
items.description: We leverage the latest data and technology to give our students a competitive edge in admissions.

items.title: Empathy
items.description: We understand the pressure of admissions. We are here to listen, support, and guide with care.

team.title: Meet Our Experts
team.description: Our team consists of former admissions officers from Ivy League universities, experienced career counselors, and industry experts.

members.name: Sarah Jenkins
members.bio: Former Harvard Admissions Officer with 15 years of experience in higher ed consulting.

members.name: David Chen
members.bio: PhD in Engineering from MIT. Helps students navigate complex STEM program requirements.

members.name: Maria Rodriguez
members.bio: Award-winning writer and editor. Specializes in helping students craft compelling personal statements.

members.name: James Wilson
members.bio: Expert in visa processes and international scholarship opportunities for global students.

cta.title: Ready to Start Your Journey?
cta.description: The path to your dream university begins with a single step. Book a free consultation with our experts today and discover how we can help you succeed.
